definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: dart, javelin (NH id.)—abs. ´[[כ]] Jos 8:18 + 6 t.; [[כִּידׂן]] Je 50:42; cstr. [[כִּידוֹן]] 1Sa 17:6; —dart, javelin (distinct fr. [[חֲנִית]] spear, lance, q.v.), ([[ך]])[[אשׁר ביד ]] ´[[נטה בַּכּ]] Jos 8:18, Jos 8:18, cf. v:Jos 8:26; ´[[רַעַשׁ כּ]] Job 41:21 the rushing sound of a dart; [[בְּהֶרֶב]] ´[[וּבַחֲנִית וּבְכ]] 1Sa 17:45 (weapons of Goliath), ´[[כ]] [[נְחשֶׁת בֵּין כְּתֵפָיו]] v:1Sa 17:6 ([[חֲנִית]] in v:1Sa 17:7); + [[חֲנִית]] Job 39:23 also; ´[[קֶשֶׁת וְכ]] Je 6:23, Je 50:42.
